com.centurylink.mdw.email

Class TemplatedEmail

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.centurylink.mdw.email.TemplatedEmail

  • public class TemplatedEmail
extends java.lang.Object
    Sends an e-mail based on a template stored on the file system. Parameterization is performed using javabean access on the specified model object.
